news_header: Texas residents discuss renaming the Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America, reflecting mixed opinions on Trump's influence.
news_original_title: Trump haluaa poistaa Meksikonlahden maailmankartoilta, mutta Texasissa kielipoliisi kohtaa myös vastarintaa
news_text: In Texas, locals express mixed feelings about renaming the Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America, a joke turned serious since Trump's presidency. While some support the change, others criticize the idea of Trump dictating language.
